ratpack.func

Interface Action.ConditionalSpec<I>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - the input type
    Enclosing interface:
    Action<T>

    public static interface Action.ConditionalSpec<I>
    A spec for adding conditions to a conditional action.
    Since:
    1.5
    See Also:
    Action.conditional(Action, Action)
